profile.name: John Doe
profile.summary: Building Flutter apps that work - disciplined Flutter developer with expertise in Firebase (Auth, Cloud Firestore, RealtimeDatabase, Cloud Functions), RESTful APIs, and Riverpod. Designing intuitive, responsive UI/UX, delivering robust backend logic and architecting clean, scalable, cross-platform solutions.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Industrial Internet of Things

points: Developed 8+ high-performance Flutter screens to improve user onboarding and boost engagement metrics.
Integrated Firebase Authentication with role-based access (admin & user), enhancing security and reducing login errors.
Refactored modular Flutter widgets in collaboration with designers using Figma, reducing load time by 50%.
Built reusable components for the codebase to support a clean, scalable front-end architecture.

projects.name: DeciMate - Decision Making App
points: Developed a real-time collaborative polling platform in Flutter, enabling multiple users to vote simultaneously.
Executed multi-user authentication using Firebase Auth and Firestore-based vote and session management.
Applied Provider for state management to ensure responsive UI updates during live polls.
Facilitated instant, synchronized group decision-making through a clean interface and reliable session continuity.

projects.name: E-Truck - Freight Management App
points: Developed a comprehensive truck management system in Flutter, streamlining vehicle tracking and maintenance.
Integrated Firebase Auth for secure user authentication and Firestore for efficient data storage.
Implemented a state management solution using Provider to ensure smooth UI updates and real-time data handling.
Enhanced user experience through a clean, intuitive interface and reliable session continuity.

projects.name: SmartCart - Smart Shopping Cart
points: Developed a smart shopping cart system in Flutter, streamlining product tracking and inventory management.
Integrated Firebase Auth for secure user authentication and Firestore for efficient data storage.
Implemented a state management solution using Provider to ensure smooth UI updates and real-time data handling.
Enhanced user experience through a clean, intuitive interface and reliable session continuity.

skills.technologies: Flutter, Firebase, Provider, Riverpod, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQLite, Flask, FastAPI, Node.js, REST APIs, TensorFlow Lite, AWS, GCP, Data Structures and Algorithms, VS Code, Git, GitHub, Android Studio, Figma, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop
